title: Right to Information Act, 2005
summary:
### Summary

summary:
### Summary
Guarantees free and compulsory education for children.

summary:
### Summary

### Summary

summary:

### Summary

summary:
### Summary
Repeals three farm laws after widespread protests.

### Summary

summary:
